data.title: Best selling game franchises
authors: Contributors to Video Game Sales Wiki
data.meta_description: This is a list of best-selling video game franchises that have sold at least 10 million copies. Unless otherwise stated, numbers indicate worldwide units sold, ordered alphabetically whenever two or more list the same amount. The exception are the ones specifying shipments, which have lower...
